          <title>
            <string language="sl">Zaporedje osi</string>
            <string language="en">Sequence of the axis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolge der Mittellinie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordre de l'axe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seqüência da linha central</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sequenza dell'asse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακολουθία του άξονα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Secuencia del eje</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Načini dolečevanja in identificiranja koordinatnih osi.</string>
            <string language="en">How to identify coordinate axis and determine the sequence of axis.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pravilo desne roke</string>
            <string language="en">right hand rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">usmerjenost koordinatne osi</string>
            <string language="en">axis orientation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man Koordinatenachse kennzeichnet und die 
Reihenfolge der Mittellinie feststellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment identifier l'axe du même rang et 
déterminer l'ordre de l'axe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como identificar a linha central coordenada e 
determinar a seqüência da linha central.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come identificare asse coordinato e determinare la
sequenza dell'asse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να προσδιορίσει τον ισότιμο άξονα και να 
καθορίσει την ακολουθία άξονα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo identificar eje coordinado y determinar la 
secuencia del eje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rechte Richtlinie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
